title: I missed you all
body:
So how about the first 5 people to post a screenshot of their honor level 5 get 500 RP?

EDIT:
5 already passed, and I went way over 5.

Ridiculous roleplaying game later..let's go.

replies.body:
You know, Tantram, some of us have jobs and can't do that right now. :D

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Fine. I looked you up and you are honor level 5. Granted.

You are a gentleman and a scholar. Thank you so much. :D

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
You are most welcome. Have fun at work .. now get back to work!
what a gentleman!
Is that open for EUW? :p
Sure is.

Well I can go back to work with a happy smile :-)

Thanks!
sent

Ok, I'll grant some for all that made it in so far (which is more than 5).

Running low on RP.

But, I'll be playing some games if people want to join me later, and will probably hand out some RP there .. if you roleplay as your champion the entire game.
deal! what time we talkin? (eastern)
Weirdest champ to role play? I’m thinking {{champion:350}} or {{champion:432}}
I don't want RP. Just attention.{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Attention, given.

26 minutes and i already missed my chance. 

Missed you too Tantram. How about a PB AMA?

I'm not working in the PB space anymore. I moved on to being a more general architect for League. But, happy to answer questions I know answers to:).

That's one of the reasons you haven't seen me around here as much. I've been busy!
This is my first season and I'm honor 4 checkpoint 3 of 3! I've reformed! I was honor zero last year I think or the last! Check me out riot tantrum. I've done great! At work so I cant post picture
Rounded your RP up to the nearest 100 for trying.
Congrats to you! Keep it up!

> [{quoted}](name=Rebel 986,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EuhGLMeB,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-10-15T17:41:51.442+0000)
>
> This is my first season and I'm honor 4 checkpoint 3 of 3! I've reformed! I was honor zero last year I think or the last! Check me out riot tantrum. I've done great! At work so I cant post picture

Same i had my last chat restriction last year on the end of september and i have being clean ever sins :D
Also congrats to you!
I cant IM AT SCHOLL PLEASE
Missed the top 5 for 500 .. you get 100. Stay in school .. do your homework.
Im honor 4 and 3 bubs. Damnit.
Ditto. I am simultaneously frustrated and disappointed with myself.
Wait, wait, what? How is GatekeeperTDS, the Curmudgeon of the Player Behavior Board, higher honor than both of you?
I went through a heavy TFT phase. Was rough bruh.

Hey Riot Tantram, I am an honor lvl 5 player and I also happen to be a CS major in my 4th year who is looking to apply to Riot games as a software developer when i graduate. Will  u be kind enough to give me some RP as well? Thanks and stay awesome! :)
when is the Riot Tantram stream?
Hmmm, maybe I'll stream later if I can wrangle up some moderators. But lunch is first on my agenda:-).
Literally who?
Tantram was head coder/programmer for the IFS behavior system.
I missed it, but ill add to the thread just because. Ive been honor 5 every season, and this is a great thread idea. Good job Riot tantrum :D. (will edit in an image after my match)

can i still participate?
https://i.imgur.com/09NTZY9.jpg
Oh I'm late, honor lvl5 but at work so no screenshot :/

http://prntscr.com/pjp1yt

Please and thank you :D
Boom.
https://imgur.com/CrpgJ1a
Granted. Even though your image is broken:-p
so wait do i get some? i posted my thing right as you sent yours, ive been trying for a few minutes and computering is hard {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
I threw you 100
Honour 5 but in champ select right now. Ah, well. Always nice seeing you here. Well done to those who get it.
Got you 100

No time for pretty screenshots. Here you go, homie:

https://imgur.com/a/SDbpfKy

Love you

{{sticker:sg-lulu}} 

EDIT: I was in champ select when I saw 3 replies. Hope I made it in time.

https://imgur.com/WxsYSTV.png[]
Btw my cat had kittens and now we have a Mark.
My dad named him.  He has a mark on his back.
I'm going to need you to pet that cat for me.
Missed you too Tantram :p

<3 <3
RIP. I miss working with NeuroCat :(
